text:
During the execution of an stcheckout task, I supplied a 4.0 version of the 
starteam-sdk.jar and received an exception because the BuildNumber class did 
not contain a getDisplayString() method.  This method was added in a later 
version of the starteam sdk.  I have obtained a later version of the starteam-
sdk.jar, but a fix may need to be added for backward compatibility.
creator: bob_kimball@yahoo.com
antoine@apache.org
text: starteam ant tasks have been removed starting with Ant 1.8.0
